statements: GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON Block TO user1;
GRANT SELECT ON Block TO user2;
GRANT SELECT, UPDATE ON Block TO user3;
GRANT SELECT ON blockchain_transactions TO user1
GRANT INSERT ON blockchain_blocks TO user2
GRANT UPDATE(balance) ON blockchain_wallets TO user3
GRANT SELECT ON Block TO user1
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON Transaction TO user2
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON Address TO user3
